abstract_ssm: The Herbert Morawetz collection contains published and unpublished materials related to the career and scholarship of 20th century polymer chemist Herbert Morawetz including correspondence, awards and honors, copies of books and articles, and personal, autobiographical writing.
corpname_ssm: Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries
